001import java.util.Scanner;
002import java.io.File;
003import java.io.FileNotFoundException;
004import java.util.List;
005import java.util.ArrayList;
006import java.util.Arrays;
007
008
009/**
010 *  Class GameEngine - Creates all rooms, creates the parser and starts
011 *  the game.  It also evaluates and executes the commands that 
012 *  the parser returns.
013 *  
014 *  This class is part of the "World of Zuul" application. 
015 *  "World of Zuul" is a very simple, text based adventure game.
016 * 
017 * @author  Michael Kolling and David J. Barnes
018 * @version 1.0 (Jan 2003) DB edited (2019)
019 */
020public class GameEngine
021{
022    private Parser        aParser;
023    private UserInterface aGui;
024    private Player        aPlayer;
025    
026    private Room          aGenerators;
027    private Room          aReactors;
028    private Room          aControlRoom;
029    
030    private List<String>  aWinItems = Arrays.asList("fuse","fuel","sensor");
031    private List<String>  aUsedItems = new ArrayList();
032
033    
034    /**
035     * Constructor for objects of class GameEngine
036     */
037    public GameEngine()
038    {
039        this.aParser = new Parser();
040        this.createRooms();
041    } // GameEngine()
042
043    /**
044     * Sets the game graphical user interface.
045     * 
046     * @param pUserInterface instance of the userInterface class.
047     */
048    public void setGUI( final UserInterface pUserInterface )
049    {
050        this.aGui = pUserInterface;
051        this.aPlayer.setGUI(pUserInterface);
052        this.printWelcome();
053    } // setGUI()
054
055    /**
056     * Print out the opening message for the player.
057     */
058    private void printWelcome()
059    {
060        this.aGui.print("\n");
061        this.aGui.println("Welcome to Stranded !");
062        this.aGui.println("You found yourself in an deserted spacecraft orbiting an unknown planet.");
063        this.aGui.println("Your objective: explore the ship, discover what happened,\nand repair the critical systems to get out of here.\n");
064        this.aGui.println( "Type 'help' if you need assistance navigating the ship.\n" );
065        printLocationInfo();
066        if (this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getImageName() != null)
067            this.aGui.showImage(this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getImageName());
068    } // printWelcome()
069
070    /**
071     * Create all the rooms and link their exits together.
072     */
073    private void createRooms()
074    {
075        this.aControlRoom = new Room("in the control room, all the electronic systems and\nconsoles are turned off.","Control_Room.png");
076        Room vObservatory = new Room("in the observatory, you gaze through large windows and see\na planet, growing bigger and bigger as the time passes","Observatory.png");
077                
078        Room vLab = new Room("in the laboratory, there's various tools and experimental objects\nlying on tables, hinting at recent research activity.","Lab.png");
079        Room vCanteen = new Room("in the canteen, empty tables and chairs give the impression\nof a recently abandoned space. You can also find food here.","Canteen.png");
080        Room vQuarters = new Room("in the crew quarters and find yourself facing three rooms.","Quarters.png");
081        Room vQ1 = new Room("in your quarters, you awaken surrounded by sparse, familiar\nbelongings and a sense of urgency to uncover what happened.","Q1.png");
082        Room vQ2 = new Room("in the second room, you notice scattered\nclothes and signs of a hasty exit.","Q2.png"); //nathan
083        Room vQ3 = new Room("in the third room, there is an eerie silence, as if frozen in time.","Q3.png"); //ana
084        
085        Room vStorage = new Room("in the storage room, shelves are stacked with supplies\nand components that may be useful for repairs.","Storage.png");
086        this.aReactors = new Room("in the reactors room, you hear loud clicking noises,\nand the machinery looks unstable and damaged.","Reactors.png");
087        this.aGenerators = new Room("in the generator room, equipment for energy generation\nlies dormant, waiting for reactivation.","Generators.png");
088        
089        Room vLowerDeck = new Room("on the lower deck, the dim lighting and narrow passages\ncreate a tense atmosphere.","Lower_Deck.png");
090        Room vMainDeck = new Room("on the main deck, you stand at the crossroads of several\nhallways leading to different parts of the ship.","Main_Deck.png");
091        Room vUpperDeck = new Room("on the upper deck, you find the entrance to key rooms,\ncrucial for regaining control of the ship.","Upper_Deck.png");
092
093        
094        
095        this.aControlRoom.setExits("south",vUpperDeck);
096        vObservatory.setExits("north",vUpperDeck);
097        
098        vLab.setExits("south", vMainDeck);
099        //vCanteen.setExits("northwest", vQuarters); (trap door)
100        vCanteen.setExits("north", vMainDeck);   
101        vQuarters.setExits("southeast", vCanteen);
102        vQuarters.setExits("east", vMainDeck);   
103        vQuarters.setExits("room1", vQ1);   
104        vQuarters.setExits("room2", vQ2);   
105        vQuarters.setExits("room3", vQ3);   
106        vQ1.setExits("out", vQuarters);                         
107        vQ2.setExits("out", vQuarters);                         
108        vQ3.setExits("out", vQuarters);             
109
110        vStorage.setExits("east", vLowerDeck);        
111        this.aReactors.setExits("north", vLowerDeck);           
112        this.aGenerators.setExits("west", vLowerDeck);
113        
114        vLowerDeck.setExits("east",this.aGenerators);
115        vLowerDeck.setExits("south",this.aReactors);
116        vLowerDeck.setExits("west",vStorage);
117        vLowerDeck.setExits("upstairs",vMainDeck);
118        
119        vMainDeck.setExits("north",vLab);
120        vMainDeck.setExits("south",vCanteen);
121        vMainDeck.setExits("west",vQuarters);
122        vMainDeck.setExits("downstairs",vLowerDeck);
123        vMainDeck.setExits("upstairs",vUpperDeck);
124        
125        vUpperDeck.setExits("north",this.aControlRoom);
126        vUpperDeck.setExits("south",vObservatory);
127        vUpperDeck.setExits("downstairs",vMainDeck);
128        
129        Item vFuse = new Item("fuse","a small metallic fuse, it could help reactivating the generators.", 1.0);
130        vStorage.addItem(vFuse);
131        
132        Item vFlashlight = new Item("flashlight","a flashlight, the batteries are still working", 2.0);
133        vQ1.addItem(vFlashlight);
134        
135        Item vFuel = new Item("fuel","a red gas canister, filled with gasoline. ", 6.0);
136        vStorage.addItem(vFuel);
137        
138        Item vMagicPill = new Item("boost_pill", "a pill of nano-engineered proteins.\nEnhances your strength instantly when consumed.", 0.5);
139        vLab.addItem(vMagicPill);
140        
141        Item vChips = new Item("chips","a pack of Orbitos, some crispy chili-flavoured chips. ", 2.0);
142        vCanteen.addItem(vChips);
143        
144        Item vWatch = new Item("watch","a high-tech gravimetric watch designed for space missions.\nDisplays the time remaining before the ship crashes into the planet.\n",2.0);
145        vObservatory.addItem(vWatch);
146        
147        Item vBeamer = new Item("beamer", "a sophisticated device capable of instant teleportation\nto a memorized location.", 3.0);
148        vLab.addItem(vBeamer);
149        
150        Item vSensor = new Item("sensor", "a high-tech device capable of detecting faults in\nelectronic systems. The reactors won't run without it",2.0);
151        vLab.addItem(vSensor);
152        
153        Item vToolBox = new Item("toolbox", "a toolbox containing various tools like screwdrivers\nand small wrenches. It’s a must-have for any serious repair work.", 4.5);
154        this.aControlRoom.addItem(vToolBox);
155
156        this.aPlayer = new Player("Player1",vQ1);
157    } // createRooms()
158
159    /**
160     * Given a command, process (that is: execute) the command.
161     * If this command ends the game, true is returned, otherwise false is
162     * returned.
163     * 
164     * @param pCommandLine Command line to be processed.
165     */
166    public void interpretCommand( final String pCommandLine ) 
167    {
168        this.aGui.println( "\n> " + pCommandLine );
169        Command vCommand = this.aParser.getCommand( pCommandLine );
170
171        if ( vCommand.isUnknown() ) {
172            this.aGui.println( "I don't know what you mean..." );
173            return;
174        }
175
176        String vCommandWord = vCommand.getCommandWord();
177        if ( vCommandWord.equals( "help" ) )
178            this.printHelp();
179        else if ( vCommandWord.equals( "go" ) )
180            this.goRoom( vCommand );
181        else if ( vCommandWord.equals( "quit" ) ) 
182        {
183            if ( vCommand.hasSecondWord() )
184                this.aGui.println( "Quit what?" );
185            else
186                this.endGame();
187        }
188        else if (vCommandWord.equals("eat"))
189        {
190            if ( !vCommand.hasSecondWord() )
191                this.aGui.println( "Eat what ?" );
192            else
193                this.aPlayer.eat(vCommand.getSecondWord());
194        }
195        else if (vCommandWord.equals("look"))
196            this.look(vCommand);
197        else if (vCommandWord.equals("back"))
198        {
199            if ( vCommand.hasSecondWord() )
200                this.aGui.println( "Back what ?" );
201            else
202                this.goBack();
203        }
204        else if (vCommandWord.equals("test"))
205            this.test(vCommand.getSecondWord());
206        else if (vCommandWord.equals("take"))
207        {
208            if ( !vCommand.hasSecondWord() )
209                this.aGui.println( "Take what ?" );
210            else
211                this.aPlayer.take(vCommand.getSecondWord());
212        }
213        else if (vCommandWord.equals("drop"))
214        {
215            if ( !vCommand.hasSecondWord() )
216                this.aGui.println( "Drop what ?" );
217            else
218                this.aPlayer.drop(vCommand.getSecondWord());
219        }
220        else if (vCommandWord.equals("inventory"))
221        {
222            this.printInventory();
223        }
224        else if (vCommandWord.equals("charge"))
225        {
226            if ( !vCommand.hasSecondWord() || !vCommand.getSecondWord().equals("beamer"))
227                this.aGui.println( "Charge what ?" );
228            else
229                this.aPlayer.chargeBeamer(vCommand.getSecondWord());
230        }
231        else if (vCommandWord.equals("fire"))
232        {
233            if ( !vCommand.hasSecondWord() || !vCommand.getSecondWord().equals("beamer"))
234                this.aGui.println( "Fire what ?" );
235            else
236                this.aPlayer.fireBeamer(vCommand.getSecondWord());
237        }
238        else if(vCommandWord.equals("use"))
239        {
240            if ( !vCommand.hasSecondWord() )
241            {
242                this.aGui.println( "Use what ?" );
243            }
244            else
245            {
246                use(vCommand.getSecondWord());
247            }
248        }
249        else if(vCommandWord.equals("win"))
250        {
251            if ( vCommand.hasSecondWord() )
252            {
253                this.aGui.println( "Win what ?" );
254            }
255            else
256            {
257                winGame();
258            }
259        }
260        else
261        {
262            this.aGui.println("Erreur du programmeur : commande non reconnue !");
263        }
264    } // interpretCommand()
265    
266    /**
267     * Prints the player's current location and available exits.
268     */
269    private void printLocationInfo()
270    {
271        this.aGui.println(this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getLongDescription());
272    } // printLocationInfo()
273    
274    /**
275     * Prints the player's inventory and its weight.
276     */
277    private void printInventory()
278    {
279        this.aGui.println(this.aPlayer.getInvString());
280    }
281    
282    /** 
283     * Makes the player look around or at a specific item.
284     * 
285     * @param pC The command entered by the player, containing an 
286     *           optional second word representing the name of the item to look at.
287     */
288    private void look(final Command pC)
289    {
290        if (!pC.hasSecondWord()) 
291        {
292            printLocationInfo();
293            return;
294        }
295        
296        String vItemName = pC.getSecondWord();
297        Item vItem = this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getItem(vItemName);
298        
299        if (vItem != null)
300        {
301            this.aGui.println(vItem.getItemString());
302        }
303        else
304        {
305            this.aGui.println("There is no '" + vItemName + "' here.");
306        }
307    } // look()
308        
309    /**
310     * Print out some help information.
311     * Here we print some stupid, cryptic message and a list of the 
312     * command words.
313     */
314    private void printHelp() 
315    {
316        this.aGui.println("You woke up alone in a big spaceship.\nThe place is totally deserted.");
317        this.aGui.println("You must gather the information and components needed to repair critical systems.");
318        this.aGui.println("\nAvailable commands : "+this.aParser.getCommandString());
319    } // printHelp() 
320
321    /** 
322     * Try to go to one direction. If there is an exit, enter the new
323     * room, otherwise print an error message.
324     */
325    private void goRoom( final Command pCommand ) 
326    {
327        if ( !pCommand.hasSecondWord() ) {
328            // if there is no second word, we don't know where to go...
329            this.aGui.println( "Go where?" );
330            return;
331        }
332
333        String vDirection = pCommand.getSecondWord();
334        Room vNextRoom = this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getExit( vDirection );
335
336        if ( vNextRoom == null )
337            this.aGui.println( "There is no door!" );
338        else {
339            this.aPlayer.goRoom(vNextRoom);
340            this.aGui.println( this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getLongDescription() );
341            if ( this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getImageName() != null )
342                this.aGui.showImage( this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getImageName() );
343        }
344    } // goRoom()
345    
346    /** 
347     * Makes the player go back to previous room.
348     * Can be used infinitely, until the player is back to the first visited room.
349     */
350    private void goBack()
351    {
352        if (this.aPlayer.aVisitedRooms.empty()) 
353        {
354            this.aGui.println("You cannot go back from here! No previous room.");
355            return;
356        }
357        else
358        {
359            this.aPlayer.goBack();
360            this.aGui.println( this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getLongDescription() );
361            if ( this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getImageName() != null )
362                this.aGui.showImage( this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getImageName() );
363        }
364    } // goBack()
365    
366    /**
367     * When called, the player uses the specified item.
368     * Only works if the player wants to use a "usable" item, in the right room.
369     * 
370     * @param pItemName The name of the item to be used.
371     */
372    public void use(final String pItemName)
373    {
374        switch(pItemName)
375        {
376            case "fuse" :
377                if (this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().equals(this.aGenerators))
378                {
379                    if (this.aPlayer.use(pItemName) == true)
380                    {
381                    this.aUsedItems.add(pItemName);
382                    this.aGui.println("Used " + pItemName + ". All the electronic systems came back to life !");
383                    this.aGenerators.updateDescription("in the generator room, the equipment is now operational\nand full of electricity.");
384                    }
385                }
386                else
387                {
388                    this.aGui.println("You cannot use this here.");
389                }
390                break;
391            
392            case "fuel" :
393                if (this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().equals(this.aReactors))
394                {
395                    if (this.aPlayer.use(pItemName) == true)
396                    {
397                    this.aUsedItems.add(pItemName);
398                    this.aGui.println("Used " + pItemName + ". The fuel tank is now full.");
399                    }
400                }
401                else
402                {
403                    this.aGui.println("You cannot use this here.");
404                }
405                break;
406            
407            case "sensor" :
408                if (this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().equals(this.aReactors))
409                {
410                    if (this.aPlayer.use(pItemName) == true)
411                    {
412                    this.aUsedItems.add(pItemName);
413                    this.aGui.println("Used " + pItemName + ". The sensor is placed.");
414                    }
415                }
416                else
417                {
418                    this.aGui.println("You cannot use this here.");
419                }
420                break;
421                
422            default :
423                this.aPlayer.use(pItemName);
424        }
425                
426        if (this.aUsedItems.containsAll(this.aWinItems))
427        {
428            this.aReactors.updateDescription("in the reactors room, the machinery is now running\nand the clicking noises are gone.");
429            this.aGui.println("\nEverything seems to be working again !");
430            this.aGui.println("Head up quickly to the control room and\nregain control of the ship.");
431        }
432    } // use()
433    
434    private void winGame()
435    {
436        if (this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().equals(this.aControlRoom) && this.aUsedItems.containsAll(this.aWinItems))
437        {
438            this.aGui.println("\nCongratulations! You've repaired the critical\nsystems and saved the ship!");
439            this.aGui.showImage("win.png");
440            endGame();
441        }
442    }
443    
444    /**
445     * Executes a series of commands from a specified text file.
446     * The commands are read line by line from the file and 
447     * passed to interpretCommand() for processing.
448     *
449     * @param  pFileName The name of the file containing the commands to test.
450     *                   If the file extension is not ".txt", it will be appended automatically.
451     */
452    private void test(String pFileName)
453    {
454        if (pFileName == null) 
455        {
456            this.aGui.println("Please specify a filename to test.");
457            return;
458        }
459    
460        if (!pFileName.endsWith(".txt"))
461        {
462            pFileName += ".txt";
463        }
464        
465        Scanner vSc;
466        try
467        {
468            vSc = new Scanner(new File(pFileName));
469            while(vSc.hasNextLine())
470            {
471                String vLine = vSc.nextLine();
472                this.interpretCommand(vLine);
473            }
474        }
475        catch (final FileNotFoundException pFNFE)
476        {
477            this.aGui.println("File not found.");
478        }
479    } // test()
480    
481    /** 
482     * Ends the game when called.
483     */
484    private void endGame()
485    {
486        this.aGui.println( "Thank you for playing.  Good bye." );
487        this.aGui.enable( false );
488    } // endGame()
489
490}
